body.p: The BOM includes five (5) jumpers (PN TSP57827) that are used to short current transformers (CTs) in the monitoring system to prevent them generating a voltage. The jumpers are shipped in the documentation envelope. Transformer Jumpers

A DIN rail with terminal blocks and fuses is located on the inside panel behind the Retrofit Bypass Cabinet door. To short a CT, screw a jumper into the corresponding phase position in the black terminal blocks.
